text: Amelia Okoli (14 May 1941 - 1 November 2017) was a female track and field athlete from Nigeria. She specialised in the high jump event during her career. Okoli represented Nigeria at the 1964 Olympic Games. She claimed a gold medal for her native West African country at the 1965 All-Africa Games. Okoli finished tenth in the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games high jump. ==References== * *Amelia Okoli's obituary Category:1941 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Nigerian female high jumpers Category:Olympic athletes of Nigeria Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Nigeria Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:African Games gold medalists for Nigeria Category:African Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1965 All-Africa Games
title: Amelia Okoli
